name: Kahtoola MICROspikes Traction Device - Unisex
description: Grippy, durable, slip-on traction systems, with strategically placed stainless steel spikes connected to a dynamic flex-chain with tough elastomer shoe harnesses. The spike design is excellent for walking, hiking, or running on packed snow, and provides excellent traction on ice.Sizes indicated work for shoes. For bulkier footwear (hiking boots or winter boots), go up one size. For example, choose medium Microspikes to fit a women's size 9 winter boot.
